title: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD) Assessment
description: This questionnaire helps you assess the frequency and severity of obsessive thoughts and compulsive behaviors. By reflecting on your experiences, you'll gain insight into how these behaviors affect your time and well-being.

questions.question: How much time do you spend on obsessive thoughts?
How much distress do these thoughts cause you?
How difficult do you find it to control these thoughts?
How much do these thoughts interfere with your daily functioning?
How much time do you spend performing compulsive behaviors?
How much distress do you feel if you cannot perform these behaviors?
How difficult is it for you to resist performing these behaviors?
How much do these behaviors interfere with your daily functioning?
